com.alibaba.druid.util.jdbc

类 StatementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alibaba.druid.util.jdbc.StatementBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable, Statement, Wrapper
    直接已知子类:
    MockStatement, PreparedStatementBase

    public abstract class StatementBase
extends Object
implements Statement
